CustomField.description: Checked is the Street Address, City Name and Zipcode are the same on the Property as they are on the Validated Property Address record
CustomField.formula: AND(LOWER(VAddress1__c) == LOWER(Property__r.Name), LOWER(Vcity_name__c) == LOWER(Property__r.City__c), Vzipcode__c == Property__r.ZipCode__c, LOWER(Vcounty_name__c) == LOWER(Property__r.County__c))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Checked is the Street Address, City Name and Zipcode are the same on the Property as they are on the Validated Property Address record
CustomField.label: Has Same Name
